channel.title: SRL anti-random behavior
channel.description:
Hello,
Has anyone made a function that I could use in SRL to play an audio alarm and pause the script so I can take care of the random/mod/other stuff it can't handle instead of logging out or switching players?
I'll be near the computer most of the times I plan on having scripts running and I believe it could lower significantly my chances of getting characters banned. (I know, having the alarm sound while I'm not there would be worse than logging out, perhaps a countdown of some sort?)
Thanks in advance,
Darkshado

item.title: SRL anti-random behavior
item.dc:creator: @Darkshado Darkshado
item.description:
